description: {"blocks":[{"key":"77jib","text":"To downsample ndpi or svs images to 10x, 5x, and 1x tifs, use this function:          ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecb95","text":"      create_downsampled_tif_images\nor try Openslide in python","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3pr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mdc","text":"To calculate registration on the low resolution (1x) images ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9igb2","text":"1. calculate the tissue area and background pixels using this function:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j6c4","text":"      calculate_tissue_ws","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ofbi","text":"2. calculate the registration transforms:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hslj","text":"     calculate_image_registration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t5j2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uarj","text":"To build a 3D tissue volume using sematic segmentation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98n40","text":"1. generate manual annotations in Aperio imagescope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85qbn","text":"2. apply the deep learning function to train a model and segment the high resolution (5x or 10x) images:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"632mi","text":"     train_image_segmentation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5fbk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6goq3","text":"To apply the registration to segmented images:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kpgk","text":"                             apply_image_registration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcoqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3903m","text":"To build a 3D tissue matrix from registered, classified images:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eer91","text":"                             build_tissue_volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"296t2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr3u8","text":"To build a 3D cell volume containing nuclear coordinates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6vps","text":"1. Build a mosaic image containing regions of many whole-slide images for cell detection optimization:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jleg","text":"                             make_cell_detection_mosaic","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ag3h","text":"2. Manually annotate the mosaic image to get the ‘ground-truth’ number of cell nuclei:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9oje3","text":"                             manual_cell_count","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5576t","text":"3. Determine cell detection parameters using the manual annotations on the mosaic image:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kjsn","text":"                             get_nuclear_detection_parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ldq0","text":"4. Deconvolve the high-resolution (5x or 10x) H\u0026E images before applying the cell detection algorithm:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsub3","text":"                             deconvolve_histological_images","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mvn7","text":"5. Detect cells on the hematoxylin channel of the high-resolution images:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg44e","text":"                             cell_detection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pagl","text":"6. Apply the registration to the cell coordinates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etuls","text":"                             register_cell_coordinates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kp31","text":"7. Build a 3D cell coordinate matrix corresponding to the 3D tissue matrix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g3t9","text":"                             build_cell_volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
